knimeNode.name: Add Sequences
knimeNode.shortDescription: Runs EMBOSS tools that produce sequence data (protein or DNA depending on the tool)

fullDescription.intro:
This node appends sequences (eg. DNA/Protein) to the existing table using the EMBOSS toolkit. These sequences can then be further analysed using other nodes in the PlantCell extension eg. NCBI BLAST+
Note that for this node to work, you must:
Install EMBOSS on your computer - see http://emboss.sourceforge.net
Configure the PlantCell extension to use it: see File -> Preferences -> PlantCell
Configure the node
fullDescription.option: A list of EMBOSS programs capable of plotting a sequence
Any specific options for the program should be enetered here

ports.inPort: Input sequences (eg. as made by the Columns2Sequence node)
ports.outPort: Output sequences from EMBOSS program chosen
